name: TSEROF
description:
📜STORY

A Girl Who Wakes Up One Day Charlotte feels that she has forgotten something precious and she decides to go on a journey to find something. Journey with Charlotte and find the pieces of her forgotten memories!


📽️INGAME

- Create a save slot on the start screen and play it!



- Feel free to explore the stages by choosing the stage you want to explore from the stage selection screen (If the portal is lit, please clear the previous stage first)


- Explore each stage and acquire hidden puzzle items using direction keys and jumps
